summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.0°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 659 m), light levels (up 3904 lux), and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1608 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 5903 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 658.6m lower than yesterday, 544.3m lower than the past week, 1607.9m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1065.7m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and calm and still conditions are expected. Chance of light rain, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and some sunny spells will occur. Changeable conditions.
